revised_title: Correcting Errors in Calculating Reversions Depending on Survivorships
tldr: The author, Richard Price, discusses the proper method for calculating the values of reversions depending on survivorships. He points out an error in the existing method and provides a corrected solution. The article also includes a brief explanation of the practice of assurances on the survivorship of one life beyond another and the method for determining the value in such cases.
